label: kind/bug-fix
impact/high
notes.text: Fixed issues with native sidecars by iterating over both init and regular containers to locate the proxy, resolving Destination API failures with opaque ports and injector detection issues.

label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Introduced a bug in edge-24.5.1 that prevents Linkerd from functioning on GKE with the default configuration; edge-24.5.5 is recommended instead.

label: kind/breaking-change
impact/high
notes.text: Renamed the patchs metric introduced in edge-24.3.4 to patches.
